Title: 🔁🎬 ⚡️🇺🇸🇸🇾📹 Why Pentagon Denies Establishing US Base at Kob...
Description: Forwarded From ShamS⚡️🇺🇸🇸🇾📹 Why Pentagon Denies Establishing US Base at KobaniA Pentagon spokesperson Sabrina Singh publicly dismissed rumors that US troops would establish a military base at Kobani the Syrian Kurdish stronghold border town, which remains under threat by Turkey-backed rebels and Turkish army. -When it comes to US forces in Kobani, there's no plan or intent right now to set up any base,- Pentagon deputy press secretary Sabrina Singh told.The Pentagon's denial came in response to local claims on social media after video circulated appearing to show contractors erecting concrete blast walls around a disused hotel in Kobani. Local sources emphasized that the blast walls resembled those used around US bases in the region, and said that US troops had patrolled in the area in recent weeks.Construction of the US base continues. Apparently, the United States has decided to support SDF and prevent its NATO ally Turkey from invading Kobani for an operation to expand control in northern Syria.Telegram | X

Ukrainian authorities claim the first line is almost complete, satellite imagery confirms their claim. The first… 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Ukraine has built a vast amount of defensive structures in the Dnepr region (mapped in yellow).In late October we reported that Ukraine had begun constructing new lines of fortifications in the Dnepr and Zaporozhye regions. The map above shows the rapid progress by the Ukrainian side, with yellow being the new structures and red are the existing structures.Ukraine seems to be building three lines of defenses facing eastwards, with two in front of the Dnepr river. And two lines of defenses facing southwards. The other notable work can be seen around Pavlograd, which has effectively been surrounded by fortifications. Ukrainian defenses are also visible on the left-bank of the Dnepr, especially around Dnepr International Airport.

Title: 🔁🖼 🇺🇸🇮🇱⚠️ The FBI intercepted a potential plot targeting em...
Description: Forwarded From TabZ - Alternative Media (TabZ)🇺🇸🇮🇱⚠️ The FBI intercepted a potential plot targeting employees at a Florida office of the American Israel Public Affairs Committee (AIPAC), according to court documents filed Monday.Forrest Kendall Pemberton was arrested after traveling to Plantation, Florida, with several firearms, including an AR-15 rifle, and allegedly scouting out AIPAC’s former office location. The affidavit, signed by FBI Special Agent Taylor Nicklin, states that Pemberton planned to return to the site with weapons but was stopped by law enforcement on December 25, the first night of Hanukkah.Pemberton's father alerted authorities on December 23 after discovering a letter left by his son, suggesting he intended to -close the loop- and -stoke the flames.- Further investigation revealed that Pemberton had searched for AIPAC’s former Plantation office on Google Maps, along with IRS locations in the area.After checking into a hotel near AIPAC's previous office on December 22 and leaving on December 23, Pemberton was later traced to a Tallahassee hotel. He was apprehended on December 25 while entering a ride-share vehicle with what appeared to be a soft rifle case.Pemberton admitted to targeting AIPAC due to its -political influence- and expressed frustration with the -status quo.- However, he claimed he had ultimately decided against carrying out any criminal action.The court documents describe AIPAC as an organization that -advocates and lobbies for pro-Israel policies,- echoing language on its website. Pemberton remains in custody as the investigation continues.@TabZLIVE

Title: ↩️🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Massive Russian advancements along the Pokrovsk-K...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces have begun storming 'Guitar', the last major Ukrainian fortification south of Pokrovsk city. Russian troops are entering the defensive position from the south. 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Massive Russian advancements along the Pokrovsk-Kurakhovo front in just the past 12 hours.In the Pokrovsk direction, Russian forces have captured the entirety of Volkovo, but more importantly have stormed and captured half of the large Volkovo trench line. Further south, Russian forces have captured the entirety of Novovasilevka, combing operations underway - the town was captured last night, but small Ukrainian resistance pockets remained. Russian troops have also advanced in the farms south of Uspenovka. Russian forces have almost captured Novoelizavetovka, Ukrainian forces remain in a small section in the west of the town.In the Kurakhovo direction, Ukraine has lost all its dugouts and fortifications west of Zarya. As a result, Russian troops were able to attack and capture Slavyanka. Russia also advanced along a tree-line, approaching Petropavlovka. Petropavlovka itself is insignificant, but has two vital fortifications around it. Finally, Russian forces have reached the center of Shevchenko's defensive position, a complex network of trenches just north of the town.Russian forces are getting dangerously close to the Dnepr region - the border is marked yellow on the map.

Title: 🔁🖼 ❗️🇸🇾 The National Dialogue Conference will be held on 4-5 ...
Description: Forwarded From ShamS❗️🇸🇾 The National Dialogue Conference will be held on 4-5 January 2025 in DamascusThe Syrian administration has announced preparations for the National Dialogue Conference, which is intended to be the starting point for a major political transition in the country. It will be held on 4-5 January 2025 in Damascus.The conference will bring together 1,200 figures comprised from Syria’s broad array of demographics from civil society, religion, politics, law, etc., as well as the Syrian diaspora from abroad.Among the main decisions to be taken at the conference are:🟢 Dissolution of Hayat Tahrir al-Sham and all armed factions.🟢 Formation of a committee to draft a new constitution.🟢 Establishment of an advisory body to the interim president.🟢 Establishment of a new government within a month of the conference.The event could be a unifying start for all Syrian provinces. Between 70 and 100 participants from each province, representing different social and ethnic groups, are planned to attend.Telegram | X

The Turkish leader reasoned as if he had become the head of a neighbouring state, speaking of the need to lift sanctions on Syria as soon as possible and bring it back into the global community. Erdogan emphasised that Turkey is in close contact with the new Syrian authorities and will give them full support. Turkey intends to help Hayat Tahrir al-Sham leader Ahmed al-Sharaa to create a regular army of 300,000 people, which will be formed with the participation of Turkish military advisers and specialists. According to the Türkiye newspaper, the Turkish military contingent will be deployed in five vitally important areas in Syria, which indicates Turkey's intention to make Syria a springboard for resolving its geopolitical interests in other regions of the Middle East.Telegram | X

Description: 🇨🇦⚡️- Current election polls show the Conservative party with a commanding lead over the Liberals and New Democrat Party. If a new election were to be held its possible that Bloc Quebecois would become the official opposition to a Tory majority as they gobble up the remaining Liberal seats in Montreal. Trudeau's Liberal party hasnt won a plurality of the popular vote since 2015 yet remained in power for 10 years due to co-operation with the NDP. The NDP leader Jadmeet Singh has now called for Trudeau to resign after Deputy Prime Minister Chrystia Freeland stepped down from the Cabinet this morning, cementing Trudeau's fate.

Title: 🔁 🇮🇱🇸🇾 Strategic Context of Israeli Strikes These attacks co...
Description: Forwarded From ShamS🇮🇱🇸🇾 Strategic Context of Israeli StrikesThese attacks come amid a volatile period in Syria following the abrupt collapse of Assad’s regime. Analysts suggest the strikes are part of a broader Israeli strategy to neutralize military capabilities in Syria as the country transitions to new leadership.Ashraf Akka, an expert in international relations, explained that the airstrikes appear designed to -deny the nascent governing authorities in Syria any military leverage, including advanced weaponry or infrastructure that could shift regional power dynamics.-The port of Latakia is a critical hub for Syrian and allied forces. It has frequently been used to transport military equipment from Iran, a close ally of Assad’s regime, to Syria and Hezbollah forces in Lebanon. Its targeting underscores Israel’s ongoing concerns about Iran’s entrenchment in Syria and the potential transfer of advanced weaponry to hostile groups.The Ya’four and Damascus sites, central to Syria’s former military elite, hold symbolic and strategic importance. The strikes on these locations signal Israel’s intent to dismantle remnants of the Assad regime’s military infrastructure.Israel has carried out hundreds of airstrikes in Syria over the years, targeting Iranian and Hezbollah forces. These actions are part of what Israel refers to as its -campaign between wars- strategy, aimed at weakening its adversaries without provoking a full-scale conflict.The recent strikes come at a pivotal moment for Syria as the country grapples with political instability and security vacuums. Israel has not officially commented on the latest operations, in line with its policy of ambiguity regarding military actions in Syria.The escalation highlights the fragility of the post-Assad landscape in Syria. Human rights advocates and political analysts have called for international oversight to prevent further destabilization and ensure that power vacuums do not lead to unchecked violence.Telegram | XTelegramShamSFact-based news about Syria & Independent opinionsAdmin: @ShamS_EditorOur chat: @ShamS_CHATOur X: https://x.com/sham_syrianews

Title: 🎬 🇸🇾⚡️- 53 years of Assad Dynastic rule has officially ended t...
Description: 🇸🇾⚡️- 53 years of Assad Dynastic rule has officially ended today on December 7th, 2024After 13 years of the most brutal and complicated civil war of the 21st century, the future of the country is uncertain, as loose anti-Assad coalition members will now have to determine how to move the state forward.The issue of the Israeli occupation of the Golan Heights as well as Kurdish territorial claims will now come to a head. Turkish and Russian interests are also going to be considerable.The incoming Trump Administration and NATO will have to formulate a strategy to prevent the new Syria from becoming a hotbed for terrorism as ISIS, Al Qaeda, Hay’at Tahrir al-Sham, and other groups now see the opportunity in the fallen country to return to power.

Title: 🇸🇾⚡️- The Syrian National Transitional Government has released ...
Description: 🇸🇾⚡️- The Syrian National Transitional Government has released its first statement since the fall of the Assad government.-O free sons of Syria,After long years of injustice, tyranny and oppression, and after great sacrifices made by the sons and daughters of this dear homeland, we announce today to the great Syrian people and the entire world that the regime of Bashar al-Assad has fallen, and that he has fled the country, leaving behind a legacy of destruction and suffering.On this historic day, we announce that the forces of the revolution and opposition have taken control of affairs in beloved Syria, and we affirm our commitment to building a free, just and democratic state in which all citizens are equal without discrimination.We pledge before God and before the people the following:1. Preserving the unity and sovereignty of Syrian territory.2. Protecting all citizens and their property, regardless of their affiliations.3. Working to rebuild the state and its institutions on the foundations of freedom and justice.4. Striving to achieve comprehensive national reconciliation, and returning refugees and displaced persons to their homes in safety and dignity.5. Holding accountable all those who have committed crimes against the Syrian people, in accordance with the law and justice.We call on all the Syrian people to unite and stand together at this historic stage, and we affirm that the new Syria will not be the monopoly of anyone, but rather a homeland for all.Long live a free and proud Syria,And peace, mercy and blessings of God be upon you.-National Transitional CouncilDamascus, 12/08/2024.

Title: 🔁🖼 ⚡️🇶🇦🇸🇾 Doha will decide the fate of Syria and Bashar al-...
Description: Forwarded From ShamS⚡️🇶🇦🇸🇾 Doha will decide the fate of Syria and Bashar al-AssadToday, 7 December, the Astana format meeting on Syria will be held in Qatar at the Doha Forum. The foreign ministers of Russia, Iran and Turkey will hold talks that could result in crucial decisions regarding the future of the Syrian Arab Republic and its President Bashar al-Assad.Based on the current situation in the country, Assad's chances of holding on to Syrian statehood are slim. Moreover, there are reports that he and his family have left Syria.Turkey is interested in weakening the positions of Russia and Iran in Syria and has used the offensive of the HTS and SNA controlled groups against the Syrian government forces to put pressure on Moscow and Tehran.Russia's priority will be to maintain control over the provinces of Latakia and Tartus, where military bases are located.In turn, Syria's ally Iran has realised that it cannot fight as an auxiliary force if the Syrian Army itself is unwilling to fight.Telegram | X

Title: 🖼 🇺🇸⚡️- HII’s Ingalls Shipbuilding has completed a major miles...
Description: 🇺🇸⚡️- HII’s Ingalls Shipbuilding has completed a major milestone in upgrading the USS Zumwalt (DDG 1000) following significant modifications. This work involved replacing its advanced gun systems with missile launchers designed for the Navy’s first sea-based hypersonic weapons, the Conventional Prompt Strike (CPS) system. Part of a $2 billion Lockheed Martin contract, these upgrades aim to deliver hypersonic capabilities to all of the Zumwalt-class stealth destroyers by the mid-2020s. The US Navy considers hypersonic missile capability a top priority.
